channel.title: Values on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Values on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Values and Ethics
item.description: [Location: Health_Canada_interview-4] DEFINITION Serve Canadians, ensuring integrity in personal and organizational practices, and respect people and Public Service principles, including democratic, professional, ethical, and people values. Build respectful, diverse and inclusive workplaces where decisions and transactions are transparent and fair. QUESTIONS You have been assigned to verify results from another analyst. During your verification, you have noted an error in the assay of several samples related to a specific drug. It appears that the analyst used the wrong data in applying the formula.
